sense.gloss: now that you mention it, come to think of it, that reminds me, on that subject, speaking of which

sdata.j: |そう↑言↑↓い↓えば|↑買↑↓か↓い↑物↑↓もの↓もしたいな。
sdata.e: Come to that, I'd like to do some shopping too.
Now that you say it, I think you're right.

sdata.j: |そう↑言↑↓い↓えば|、↑子供↑↓こども↓の↑頃↑↓ころ↓↑両親↑↓りょうしん↓と↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓にここに↑来↑↓き↓たことを↑覚↑↓おぼ↓えている。
sdata.e: Now you've mentioned it, I remember coming here with my parents when I was a child.

sdata.e: Now that you mention it, it's been more than 30 years since then.

sdata.e: Now that you mention it, what happened to that man who used to work here?

sdata.e: Now that I think of it, where's Tanimoto? "Playing the lone wolf, as always."
